properties.description: Alaan الآن is a SaaS-based financial services company headquartered in the United Arab Emirates, with 110 employees and $11.5M in funding. It offers AI-powered expense management, corporate cards, and spend management platforms, serving industries such as real estate, healthcare, and logistics, with a focus on real-time financial visibility and automation.
properties.content:
[Book a Demo](https://www.alaan.com/demo)

English

## Control all business expenses with one **SuperCard™**

### Smart Corporate Cards with smarter controls

**SuperCard™** that goes beyond payments - set custom limits, track expenses, add balance in seconds, and more

[See how](https://www.alaan.com/products/corporate-cards)

### Expense Managementto track every dirham

Know where, how, and when employees spend company's money.

[See how](https://www.alaan.com/products/spend-management)

### Accounting Automationfor all expense entries

Alaan integrates with all major accounting tools & ERPs to auto-export expense data to accounting books.

[See how](https://www.alaan.com/products/accounting-automation)

### Alaan Intelligenceto do the heavy-lifting

Got expense reports to create or receipts to review? Leave them to AI!

[See how](https://www.alaan.com/products/alaan-intelligence)

## Don't take our word,take theirs

[**Al Barari uses Alaan to cut down reimbursements and save 200 hours every month** \
\
Al Barari partnered with Alaan to roll out a centralised spend management platform that could streamline workflows while maintaining separation across entities.\
\
Read full story](https://www.alaan.com/customer-stories/al-barari) [**Hellochef saved 50+ hours per month** \
\
We chose Alaan for corporate cards and have stayed here for expense management. Real-time visibility and streamlined accounting – count us in! \
\
Read full story](https://www.alaan.com/customer-stories/hello-chef) [**Washmen put its spend management on auto-pilot and saved 80+ hours per week** \
\
Since switching to Alaan, Washmen has gained more transparency on its spending. The team members can pay easily without worrying about out-of-policy expenses. \
\
Read full story](https://www.alaan.com/customer-stories/washmen)

[See all Customer Stories](https://www.alaan.com/customer-stories)

## No. 1 in Expense Management across the Middle East

4.7 Rating

93%

97%

95%

Likely to Recommend

[Read all Reviews](https://www.g2.com/products/alaan/reviews)

## News & Media

## If your company has expenses, Alaan is the solution for you.

More control   \|   More savings   \|   More automation

company.name: Alaan الآن
company.about:
Alaan is an AI-powered expense management platform for businesses in the Middle East.

Our mission is to simplify finance for businesses so they can save time and money.

Alaan has everything businesses need to manage and control their expenses – smart corporate cards, AI-powered automation and insights, streamlined accounting, and centralised dashboards – all in one place.

Over 1500+ businesses in the UAE and KSA, from startups to enterprises – G42, Lulu Exchange, Rivoli, Tabby, Foodics – use Alaan to control their spending and save costs. From 2022 to now, our customers have saved over 1.5Mn hours by using Alaan.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS industry
evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile describes Alaan as an "all‑in‑one corporate card and spend management platform" and an "AI‑powered expense management platform for businesses," which indicates that the company delivers software as a cloud‑based service (SaaS). The categories list includes "expense management, corporate cards, spend management, ai, accounting automation," all of which are typical SaaS offerings. Therefore the company operates in the SaaS industry.
